mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOCATION(area, type, name, description, address, address_si, address_dong, latitude, longitude, create_date) VALUES(#{area}, #{type}, #{name}, #{description}, #{address}, #{address_si}, #{address_dong}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, now());
INSERT INTO IMAGE(mapping_idx, type, url, thumbnail_yn, origin_filename) VALUES(#{location_idx}, 'L', #{url}, #{thumbnail_yn}, #{origin_filename})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IMAGE WHERE mapping_idx=#{location_idx} AND type='L'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM IMAGE WHERE mapping_idx = #{location_idx} AND type = 'L'
